data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Bulɛgi ma ʋuaiti».
Kìzo, ee, GALA!
Gè ɠataga palaʋalai zu,
Gè ɓɔlɔa ga kpee looi,
Mazɔlɔɔ niiti ti wɔ̀inzeɠezu un ge la ba,
Ee, GALA, è nà-ɠimalalai ɠwɛɛ,
Niiti ti ɠitogai è ʋa, naati ti mina unfe nɔ̀un maaʋele ma,
Ɗa-vaa ɠa é kɛɛzu gè ɓaaɠulamai zuzosu,
Gè ɠɛa ga wɛɛn kɛ̀ɛleaiti gaazu,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa-ʋɛlɛi ma wɔinlai ɠa gàlazu eɠɛ abui.
Gè wɔlɔni ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ, gè zugi zo,
Gè saa wɔlɔ wo seɠei loa ɠɔba,
Ta zeizu kpɔgi zu, ti ɗa sùɠula,
Kɛlɛ nɔ̀un nà, nà nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi laazeelizu è ma, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Ùnmɔɔ, è kùla palaʋalai zu, gè mina mɔ yei su ʋolu!
Ziɛ veinfeingi mina màaɓɔle,
Gòoɠaaʋote, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, mazɔlɔɔ è ʋagɛ ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai zu.
Mina ʋoluave bà, nà ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ zunui.
Maaɓuɠa bà, è ùnmɔɔ.
È nà-ɓaaɠulamai ɠwɛɛ, ta nà-unfegi, ta nà-bɛlɛʋiligi,
Ɓaaɠulamai ɠa zìi ɓɔlɔzu, gè la ziɛzu bu,
Ta anivebɛi ʋuuzu nà-daamianigi zu,
Ta-laami maaɓɔgi ɠɛ ti ʋɛ ga balii, ti ɠɔɔ la,
Ti-ɠaazuʋɛ ɓidi, ti mina wozaɠa,
Ɗa-yiiɠulagi yei ti ma,
Ti-ʋuuzuʋɛ ɠoloɠolo,
Mazɔlɔɔ ta ʋilɛsu naa ʋolu, nii ɗa ɓɔɠɔi è doɠaai na,
Ta-vaaɠaaza golai ma ɠasɔi la ti unma,
Ti-laaseigi ɓale, é ɠula zɛnvu zɛʋɛi zu,
Nɔ̀un, màanɔɠɔʋɛ, gè ɗa zoolɛ ga ɓɔɠɔ,
Nà GALA daaseigi mama ga guyei,
naa nɛɛʋɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, é leʋe nikɛ zinɛi ʋa,
Ɓɔɠɔmaayei nuiti ta naa ɠa, ti ɠoozunɛ.
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa woilo bala nuiti gooi ma,
Geeɠɔlɔgi ta zooi ti maamusɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ka ʋaazu é Siyɔn taai ɠizo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-botiɠɛ nuiti ti-mavofodai ɠa ná zɔlɔɔ ga tɔnɔ,
